Text: Whats the scoopPST So I am sure you heard about last Friday and that they told everyone who was with NEWCO and who wasnt I talked to Bob and I was surprised that Sam is part of the new company Wanted to confirm that with you I have not talked to her yet since she was on vacation but was planning to do so today Let me know if anything has changed on this front How was Xmas John
